headline: Facing the Unthinkable
abstract: After a family tragedy, the Australian director found a home in the theater, creating harrowing updates of classics. His latest: “Medea” at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — A woman, abandoned by her husband, murders her children. A man, conspiring with his sister, stabs his mother. A young woman slits her throat with her lover’s razor. A girl shoots herself. A boy shoots himself. A child walks into the sea.
